summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6222 for the improvement of Raymond Street from 51st Ave. South to 51st Place South; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88948, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
